channel.title: CVE Feed for BlackBerry -- UEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BlackBerry -- UEM

item.title: CVE-2018-8890|2024-08-05T07:10:46.910Z -- blackberry -- uem
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Management Console of BlackBerry UEM 12.8.0 and 12.8.1 could allow an attacker to take over a UEM user's session and perform administrative actions in the context of the user.
